name: Monster Hunter Diary: Poka Poka Airou Village
name_original: Monster Hunter Diary: Poka Poka Airou Village
description: The word "airou" is the Japanese equivalent of felyne (Ailuro is the Greek word for cat), a fictional sapient cat species that appears in the Monster Hunter games. The player gives orders to the felynes to progress to the end of quests instead of having direct control over them. The game uses a more cartoonish art style as opposed to the more realistic style seen in the main Monster Hunter games. More emphasis is placed on style and village management.
